attributes.action: Increase the number of Drama and Music initiatives for children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Music and Drama – indeed all expressive arts – are a great way of channelling the abundant energy and imagination of children and teens alike, but why isn’t there more schemes to encourage young people, keeping them off the streets and fighting the increasing obesity problems? Increasing inter-personal skills is invaluable in a country where we don’t even know our next-door neighbours. So please, even if the above does not apply to you, make your signature count and give children of all ages, cultures and abilities to change to shine.
